actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973, as amended, to authorize appropriations for Fiscal Years 1992 and 1993 for carrying out that Act and the Inspector General Act of 1978, as amended.
short_title: Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1992 and 1993

summary.text: Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1992 and 1993 - Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize appropriations for FY 1992 and 1993 to carry out such Act and the Inspector General Act of 1978. Deletes a provision that authorizes radio broadcasting to Afghanistan.

titles.title: Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1992 and 1993

A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973, as amended, to authorize appropriations for Fiscal Years 1992 and 1993 for carrying out that Act and the Inspector General Act of 1978, as amended.
